LINKS_FOOTER: [Add me to your server](https://discordapp.com/api/oauth2/authorize?client_id={{clientID}}&permissions=8&scope=bot) | [Support server]({{discord}}) | [Vote for me](https://top.gg/bot/{{clientID}})
PREFIX: Hello! Please type **{{prefix}}help** to see all commands! You can add me to your server with **{{prefix}}add**.
USER_MISSING_PERMISSIONS: This command requires the permission level: `{{level}}`!
BOT_MISSING_PERMISSIONS:
__**Missing permissions**__

I need the following permissions for this command to work properly: {{permissions}}
JOIN_OAUTH2: {{user}} joined the server using OAuth flow.
JOIN_VANITY: {{user}} joined the server using a discord.gg invite defined by the guild owner (or admin).
JOIN_UNKNOWN: I can't figure out how {{user}} joined the server.
JOIN_PERMISSIONS: I need the manage server permissions to know who is the inviter of {{user}}.
LEAVE_OAUTH2: {{user}} left the server, they joined via OAuth.
LEAVE_VANITY: {{user}} left the server, they joined using a discord.gg invite defined by the server owner (or an admin).
LEAVE_UNKNOWN: {{user}} left the server, but I can't figure out how they joined it.
